specialAttack.name: Leap
specialAttack.description: Charges for one turn, then deals 3x damage
specialAttack.execute: if (this.charge === 0) { this.charge = 1; return `The slime charges kinetic energy for later...`; } else { this.charge = 0; return { damage: enemy.attack * 2, message: `The slime leaps full speed towards you!` }; }

specialAttack.name: Ultra Shield
specialAttack.description: Gain a LOT of defense for the turn.
specialAttack.execute: enemy.tempDefense = 99999; return `The bat encases itself in an Ultra Shield! (0 physical damage this turn)`;

specialAttack.name: Empower Ally
specialAttack.description: Increases a random ally's attack by 1
specialAttack.execute: const validTargets = allEnemies.filter(e => e.health > 0); const target = validTargets[Math.floor(Math.random() * validTargets.length)]; target.attack += 1; return `The imp empowers the ${target.type}, increasing its attack!`;

specialAttack.name: Supercharge
specialAttack.description: Heal an ally for 5 health and give them +5 max health as well.
specialAttack.execute: const validTargets = allEnemies.filter(e => e.health > 0); const target = validTargets[Math.floor(Math.random() * validTargets.length)]; target.health += 5; target.maxHealth += 5; return `The skeletal mage supercharges ${target.type}! (+5 hp/max hp)`;

specialAttack.name: Sneak Attack
specialAttack.description: Deals double damage if the enemy has full health.
specialAttack.execute: const damage = player.health === player.maxHealth ? Math.round(enemy.attack * 1.75) : enemy.attack; return { damage, message: `The goblin executes a sneak attack!` };

specialAttack.name: Regenerate
specialAttack.execute: enemy.health = Math.min(enemy.maxHealth, enemy.health + 3); return `The troll regenerates some of its health!`;

specialAttack.name: Curse
specialAttack.execute: player.tempAttack = 0; player.tempDefense = 0; return `The dark sorcerer casts a curse on you, removing bravery and defense!`;
